text:
This article serves as a supplement to Army doctrine by describing all elements of BDA to help analysts provide commanders with more than just the number of systems removed from the battlefield. It provides recommendations on how to train and organize the G-2T section and highlights the most effective ways to conduct BDA that support both targeting and the commander's decision-making process.
